subject: Only add ceilometer user to nova group if using compute agent
reviewers: [{'_account_id': 3, 'name': 'Jenkins', 'username': 'jenkins'}, {'_account_id': 1918, 'name': 'François Charlier', 'email': 'francois.charlier@redhat.com', 'username': 'francois-charlier'}, {'_account_id': 3153, 'name': 'Emilien Macchi', 'email': 'emilien@redhat.com', 'username': 'emilienm'}, {'_account_id': 7822, 'name': 'Chris Hoge (not involved in upstream development)', 'email': 'chris@hogepodge.com', 'username': 'hogepodge'}, {'_account_id': 9061, 'name': 'David Moreau Simard', 'email': 'moi@dmsimard.com', 'username': 'dmsimard'}]
revisions:
[{'number': 1, 'created': '2014-01-07 21:44:04.000000000', 'files': ['spec/classes/ceilometer_agent_compute_spec.rb', 'manifests/init.pp', 'manifests/agent/compute.pp', 'spec/classes/ceilometer_init_spec.rb'], 'message': 'Only add ceilometer user to nova group if using compute agent

When using ceilometer outside of the compute context (ex: with the
swift middleware), puppet-ceilometer attempts to add the user to
the nova group which does not (and probably should not) exist on
the swift nodes.

Change-Id: I6cc68152325a967c024ce611f92a90ce0afba8cc
'}]
commit_message:
Only add ceilometer user to nova group if using compute agent

When using ceilometer outside of the compute context (ex: with the
swift middleware), puppet-ceilometer attempts to add the user to
the nova group which does not (and probably should not) exist on
the swift nodes.

Change-Id: I6cc68152325a967c024ce611f92a90ce0afba8cc

commit_message:

'objects-2'..., so simply update obj-auditor to audit these data
also.

subject: Allow user creating with fields have ":" or "-"
revisions:
[{'number': 1, 'created': '2014-01-08 08:10:21.000000000', 'files': ['keystone/identity/controllers.py'], 'message': 'Allow user creating with fields have ":" or "-"

If we define custom fields which ":" or "-", when creating user,keystone
will convert ":" and "-" to "_". It should not be so.

Change-Id: If0467421d5b18a9cdc2c88fecfb1befd23307e5f
Closes-bug: #1241218
'}]
commit_message:
Allow user creating with fields have ":" or "-"

If we define custom fields which ":" or "-", when creating user,keystone
will convert ":" and "-" to "_". It should not be so.

Change-Id: If0467421d5b18a9cdc2c88fecfb1befd23307e5f
Closes-bug: #1241218

subject: Add API schema for v3 admin_actions API
revisions:
[{'number': 1, 'created': '2013-12-03 01:54:45.000000000', 'files': ['nova/api/openstack/compute/schemas/v3/admin_actions_schema.py', 'nova/api/validation/validators.py', 'nova/api/openstack/compute/plugins/v3/admin_actions.py', 'nova/tests/api/openstack/compute/plugins/v3/test_admin_actions.py'], 'message': 'Add API schema for v3 admin_actions API

By defining the API schema, it is possible to separate the validation
code from the API method. The API method can be more simple.
In addition, a response of API validation error can be consistency for
whole of Nova APIs.

Partially implements blueprint nova-api-validation-fw

Change-Id: Id58e0bd2e07c634e1649a41b8333e3657d7e08cf
'}]
commit_message:
Add API schema for v3 admin_actions API

By defining the API schema, it is possible to separate the validation
code from the API method. The API method can be more simple.
In addition, a response of API validation error can be consistency for
whole of Nova APIs.

Partially implements blueprint nova-api-validation-fw

Change-Id: Id58e0bd2e07c634e1649a41b8333e3657d7e08cf

subject: Fix flavor extra_spec usages
revisions:
[{'number': 1, 'created': '2014-01-14 04:46:24.000000000', 'files': ['doc/common/section_cli_nova_customize_flavors.xml'], 'message': 'Fix flavor extra_spec usages

"nova-manage" command is deprecated and "nova flavor-key" can set
flavor extra_spec instead. This patch changes the usage to show
"nova flavor-key".
In addition, "nova flavor-set" command does not exist.
This patch fixes it with "nova flavor-key" command.

Change-Id: If41899cf0af463ccc2db5127d53398f73e3a26a7
'}]
commit_message:
Fix flavor extra_spec usages

"nova-manage" command is deprecated and "nova flavor-key" can set
flavor extra_spec instead. This patch changes the usage to show
"nova flavor-key".
In addition, "nova flavor-set" command does not exist.
This patch fixes it with "nova flavor-key" command.

Change-Id: If41899cf0af463ccc2db5127d53398f73e3a26a7

commit_message:
Use the new xml namespace in v3 API

This patch uses the new xml namespace XMLNS_V3 in V3 API.

Change-Id: I726288f524a8d48f5ed2b7d9ffefa9322db2c035
Closes-Bug: #1264076

subject: Simple Certificate Extension
revisions:
[{'number': 1, 'created': '2013-12-18 06:07:32.000000000', 'files': ['etc/keystone-paste.ini', 'requirements.txt', 'keystone/contrib/simple_cert/__init__.py', 'keystone/tests/test_contrib_simple_cert.py', 'keystone/common/wsgi.py', 'keystone/contrib/simple_cert/core.py'], 'message': 'Simple Certificate Extension

Implement the Simple Certificate Extension for retrieving the signing
certificates from a server.

This extension brings in a simple Pecan extension router that allows new
extensions to be developed with Pecan/wSME. The extension and the router
are grouped because the extension is about the simplest test of the

Change-Id: I7811480f2e83f10ee26e1d9fe60fb52834d07d19
Closes-Bug: #1259011

commit_message:
Simple Certificate Extension

Implement the Simple Certificate Extension for retrieving the signing
certificates from a server.

This extension brings in a simple Pecan extension router that allows new
extensions to be developed with Pecan/wSME. The extension and the router
are grouped because the extension is about the simplest test of the
router as possible.

Change-Id: I7811480f2e83f10ee26e1d9fe60fb52834d07d19
Closes-Bug: #1259011
